Sci-Fi Weapons

A total of 32 Sci-Fi Weapons in AAA quality. Four weapon types with 8 different texture variations!

Everything is PBR and ready to be used in your game!

Contains:

  • 8 Rifles
  • 8 Snipers
  • 8 Pistols
  • 8 Heavy Weapons
  • PBR Materials
  • Example Scene

Download

You can choose to download the asset right away or wait for later by using the link we have sent to your email.
